bdi4jade.plan

Class PlanGoalDependency

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.plan.PlanGoalDependency
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndPlanGoalDependency, OrPlanGoalDependency

    public abstract class PlanGoalDependency
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class has the common properties and operations of all kinds of plan-goal dependency.

    ingrid

      • getRoot

        public Plan getRoot()
        Returns the plan that is the root of the plan-goal dependency, i.e. the plan that depends on one or more goals.
        Returns:
        the root the plan that is the root of this dependency.
